title: Home, Hearth, and Oreos: A One Act Play
description: An elderly woman in a convalescent center has one last wish; to see her grandchildren for the first time. Her son visits regularly, but for reasons unknown, he has never brought his kids to see their grandmother. There are forces pulling the family apart, but this grandmother will not give up easily. She sets a plan in motion, with the help of her loyal nurse. With love and humor, this heartwarming play proves that where there's a will, there's a way.
author: J. Suthern Hicks
